thread.title: Inside pictures from Deepika Padukone’s episode on The Ellen DeGeneres Show are out and we can’t keep calm
thread.title_full: Inside pictures from Deepika Padukone’s episode on The Ellen DeGeneres Show are out and we can’t keep calm

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Inside pictures from Deepika Padukone’s episode on The Ellen DeGeneres Show are out and we can’t keep calm
text:
After the release of xXx: the return of xander cage, Vin Diesel heads back home 
Deepika Padukone is all set to appear on The Ellen DeGeneres Show and guess what..? We have got you the first pictures from sets. This morning we were among the first ones to share with you DP’s pics from outside the sets and now that they are done shooting. The inside pictures are here. Deepika and Ellen they are both sitting on the couch and from what it looks like, they are having a whale of a time laughing at something. We wonder what they are laughing at! For all those who are eagerly waiting to see DP on the show, let me tell you, the episode will go on air tomorrow i.e. on January 19. The channel just made an official announcement on Twitter. Look at the picture.. doesn’t she look absolutely gorgeous? 
We still can’t believe our eyes! All we can say is we are so proud of you Dippi! We had earlier confirmed the news on the same as a source close to the actress stated, “Team Deepika and team Ellen have agreed to shoot one episode. Deepika’s episode has been listed for airing in the US on January 18, and in India on January 19.” (ALSO READ: Deepika Padukone shoots for The Ellen DeGeneres Show and we have ALL the pics ) Our very own @deepikapadukone is on @TheEllenShow tomorrow! Watch this space for more! #EllenOnRomedy #DeepikaOnEllen pic.twitter.com/mfeOI1PnKt 
— Romedy NOW (@RomedyNow) January 18, 2017 
The actress whose Hollywood debut film xXx: The Return of Xander Cage released in India last week and is releasing across cinema halls internationally on January 20 . Priyanka Chopra was the very first Bollywood actress to have had the opportunity to feature on The Ellen DeGeneres Show and now Deepika too is following her footsteps.
